languages.text: Торговец редкостями упомянул исчезнувшего с радаров техножреца-эксплоратора, чья кибербестия была укомплектована необычным протоколом. Возможно, Вольному Торговцу удастся найти его след в Зеркальной системе.

The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.
languages.original_text: Торговец редкостями упомянул исчезнувшего с радаров техножреца-эксплоратора, чья кибербестия была укомплектована необычным протоколом. Возможно, Вольному Торговцу удастся найти его след в Зеркальной системе.

traits.locale_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps you will be able to track him down in the Mirror System.

The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps you will be able to track him down in the Mirror System.

The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps you will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

languages.text: Der Kuriositätenhändler erwähnte einen Explorator-Techpriester, den er gekannt, zu dem er aber den Kontakt verloren hat, und dieser besaß eine Cyber-Bestie mit einem ungewöhnlichen Protokoll. Vielleicht kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn im System Speculo aufspüren.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: Der Kuriositätenhändler erwähnte einen Explorator-Techpriester, den er gekannt, zu dem er aber den Kontakt verloren hat, und dieser besaß eine Cyber-Bestie mit einem ungewöhnlichen Protokoll. Vielleicht kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ihn im System Speculo aufspüren.

languages.text: Le marchand de curiosités a mentionné avoir perdu contact avec un technoprêtre Explorator qu'il connaissait. Ce dernier possédait une cyber-bête dotée d'un protocole étrange. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} pourra peut-être le retrouver dans le système de Speculo.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: Le marchand de curiosités a mentionné avoir perdu contact avec un technoprêtre Explorator qu'il connaissait. Ce dernier possédait une cyber-bête dotée d'un protocole étrange. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} pourra peut-être le retrouver dans le système de Speculo.

languages.text: 奇物商人提到了开拓者舰队的某位技术神甫。这位技术神甫为他的生化使仆配备了独一无二的协议，或许行商浪人可以在斯派克星系中找到他。
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: 奇物商人提到了开拓者舰队的某位技术神甫。这位技术神甫为他的生化使仆配备了独一无二的协议，或许行商浪人可以在斯派克星系中找到他。
奇物商人提到了开拓者舰队的某位技术神甫。这位技术神甫为他的生化使仆配备了独一无二的协议，或许你可以在斯派克星系中找到他。

languages.text: El mercader de curiosidades mencionó a un tecnosacerdote explorador con el que perdió el contacto y que tenía una ciberbestia con un protocolo inusual. Quizá {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pueda localizarlo en el sistema Speculo.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: El mercader de curiosidades mencionó a un tecnosacerdote explorador con el que perdió el contacto y que tenía una ciberbestia con un protocolo inusual. Quizá {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pueda localizarlo en el sistema Speculo.

languages.text: 珍品商人は、かつて知っていたが連絡を失った探索技術司祭について語った。その技術司祭は珍しいプロトコルを装備したサイバービーストを所有していた。おそらくローグトレーダーはスペキュロ星系で彼の行方を追うことができるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: 珍品商人は、かつて知っていたが連絡を失った探索技術司祭について語った。その技術司祭は珍しいプロトコルを装備したサイバービーストを所有していた。おそらくローグトレーダーはスペキュロ星系で彼の行方を追うことができるかもしれない。

languages.text: Antikacı; bir zamanlar tanıdığı ancak irtibatının kesildiği, alışılmadık bir protokolle donatılmış siber hayvanı olan bir Keşiftör Tekno Rahip'ten bahsetti. Belki de Hür Tacir onu Speculo Sistemi'nden bulabilir.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant mentioned an Explorator Tech-Priest he had known but lost contact with, who owned a cyber-beast equipped with an unusual protocol. Perhaps the Rogue Trader will be able to track him down in System Speculo.

traits.locale_text: Antikacı; bir zamanlar tanıdığı ancak irtibatının kesildiği, alışılmadık bir protokolle donatılmış siber canavarı olan bir Keşiftör Tekno Rahip'ten bahsetti. Belki de Hür Tacir onu Speculo Sistemi'nden bulabilir.
